Title: Millions of hearts are accompanying (oil painting)
Publisher: Beijing renmin chubanshe (北京人民出版社)
Notes: Zhou Enlai passed away on 8 January 1976. The bus carrying his remains passed Tian'anmen Gate on 11 January. Public mourning was prohibited, but still huge crowds had gathered along the route for a silent homage.The painting reproduced on this poster is in the collection of the National Museum of China (Beijing).
